login.title: Check my wristband
login.welcome: Welcome! Log in to check the services saved to your wristband.

error.title: Log in
error.message: An error occurred during log in.

scan.label: How do I scan my wristband?

numero.label: Where can I find my wristband code?

nfc.label: My phone is NFC-compatible
nfc.caption: iPhone 7+, Android depending on the model.

bookingid.label: I'd rather use my booking number.

scan.title: How do I scan my wristband?
scan.msg1: If your phone is NFC-compatible, you can scan your wristband to input the code.
scan.msg2: Simply place your phone near your wristband and wait for the wristband code confirmation message.

numero.title: Where can I find my wristband code?
numero.msg1: There is a 14-digit code on the back of your wristband.
numero.msg2: We use the first and last 4 digits.

bookingid.title: Where can I find my booking number?

list.label: You can find your booking number:
list.item1: in the confirmation email you received when you booked
list.item2: in the Planet Center Parcs app (go to \\ My stay \\ then \\ My booking "
list.item3: on the homepage of your MyCenterParcs account, or in the \\ My booking details \\ section.

bookingid.msg: If you did not book on the Center Parcs website or via the call centre, please log in using your wristband code.

uid.label: Wristband code
uid.unknown: Your wristband code was not recognised.

cottage.label: Cottage no.
cottage.unknown: Your cottage number was not recognised.

infos.title: Info
infos.presenting: All your coupons are now paperless and saved to your wristband.

list.msg1: All your coupons are now paperless and saved to your wristband.
list.msg2: Remember to book your treatment at the Spa's reception desk.
list.lbl3: For the free activities provided as part of the Early Booking offer :
list.msg3: Go to the reception desk to schedule and book

infos.subscription: Subscribe to wristband alerts and receive an email or text message whenever the wristband is used.

errors.technical-fetch-msg: An error occurred during data transfer.
